name: AdJuggler
overview:
An independent company since 2008, AdJuggler is a global leader in on-demand digital ad serving and ad management. The company’s highly scalable SaaS platform today serves as the digital backbone for more than 200 publishers, ad networks, agencies, and marketers worldwide. We deliver:

> AWARD WINNING CUSTOMER SERVICE. AdJuggler offers 24/7/365 genuine local online and telephone support. Yes, we answer the phone when you call. Issues get resolved ASAP.

> The AdJuggler® platform, an enterprise-grade application for fast-growing publishers, ad networks, and digital marketers

> The Exchange Media Program (EMP), optimized access to more than 30 real-time-bidding (RTB) and quality network advertising sources.

> Outsourced Ad Operations for customers seeking additional campaign and traffic management, so they can focus on new advertiser relationships

> A culture of tailored customer service: a rich API, Custom Development services, and 24/7 telephone support

Our customers represent every major content category, including news and local media, sports, gaming, health, men’s interest, women’s interest, B2B, technology, social media, and international communities based in every major global geography. AdJuggler, Inc. is a privately held company headquartered in Alexandria, VA with sales locations in Washington, DC, Los Angeles, London, and Singapore

milestones.description: Advertising veteran Christopher Weiss named vice president of product marketing. Mr. Weiss joins AdJuggler from LucidMedia, a leading demand-side platform (DSP), enabling numerous advertisers, trading desks, and agencies to leverage real-time bidding (RTB
milestones.source_description: AdJuggler, Inc., Names Chris Weiss VP, Product Management To Expand RTB-Enabled Ad Platform

milestones.description: AdJuggler announced today that, since the launch of its Exchange Media Program (EMP) in April, it has successfully bid and delivered more than 1 billion real-time bid (RTB) ads on behalf of the company’s ad network and publisher customers.
milestones.source_description: AdJuggler Surpasses 1 Billion Real-Time Bid Ads And Announces Record Growth

milestones.description: PubMatic’s platform services are now available to several ad servers such as AdJuggler, Adzerk and Zedo. These companies can now extend PubMatic’s real-time bidding technology to the ad servers’ publisher clients.
milestones.source_description: PubMatic Adds Ad Servers to PubLink Enterprise App Marketplace

milestones.description: AdJuggler announced today the expansion of its Exchange Media Program (EMP) to include direct bidding into PubMatic’s Sell Side Platform (SSP) and its more than 40 premium demand sources.
milestones.source_description: AdJuggler Expands Exchange Media Program with Direct Link to PubMatic
